cards.name: Aerial Assault
cards.text: Destroy target tapped creature. You gain 1 life for each creature you control with flying.
cards.flavor:
"Oh, you must be mistaken. Hawks are solitary hunters, you see."
—Bunder Diedreck, ornithologist

rulings.text: If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Aerial Assault tries to resolve, the spell doesn’t resolve. You won’t gain life. If the target is legal but is not destroyed (most likely because it has indestructible), you will gain life.
Any abilities that trigger as the target creature is destroyed won’t resolve until after you’ve gained life.
If any creatures were exiled “until” the target creature left the battlefield, those creatures will return before you gain life.

cards.originalText: Destroy target tapped creature. You gain 1 life for each creature you control with flying.

cards.name: Aerial Assault
cards.text: Destroy target tapped creature. You gain 1 life for each creature you control with flying.
cards.flavor:
"Oh, you must be mistaken. Hawks are solitary hunters, you see."
—Bunder Diedreck, ornithologist

rulings.text: If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Aerial Assault tries to resolve, the spell doesn’t resolve. You won’t gain life. If the target is legal but is not destroyed (most likely because it has indestructible), you will gain life.
Any abilities that trigger as the target creature is destroyed won’t resolve until after you’ve gained life.
If any creatures were exiled “until” the target creature left the battlefield, those creatures will return before you gain life.

foreignNames.name: Angriff von oben
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre eine getappte Kreatur deiner Wahl. Du erhältst für jede fliegende Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Oh, da müssen Sie sich irren. Falken jagen immer einzeln, wissen Sie?"
—Bunder Diedreck, Ornithologe

foreignNames.name: Asalto aéreo
foreignNames.text: Destruye la criatura girada objetivo. Ganas 1 vida por cada criatura que controlas con la habilidad de volar.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Oh, debes de estar equivocado. Los halcones son cazadores solitarios, ¿sabes?".
—Bunder Diedreck, ornitólogo

foreignNames.name: Assaut aérien
foreignNames.text: Détruisez la créature engagée ciblée. Vous gagnez 1 point de vie pour chaque créature avec le vol que vous contrôlez.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Oh, vous devez faire erreur. Les faucons sont des chasseurs solitaires, vous savez. »
—Bunder Diedreck, ornithologue

foreignNames.name: Aggressione Aerea
foreignNames.text: Distruggi una creatura TAPpata bersaglio. Guadagni 1 punto vita per ogni creatura con volare che controlli.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Oh, di certo ti sbagli. Vedi, i falchi sono cacciatori solitari."
—Bunder Diedreck, ornitologo

foreignNames.name: 空からの突撃
foreignNames.text: タップ状態のクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。あなたはあなたがコントロールしていて飛行を持つクリーチャー１体につき１点のライフを得る。
foreignNames.flavor:
「何かの勘違いでしょう。鷹が群れで狩りをすることはありません。」
――鳥類学者、バンデル・デドレック

foreignNames.name: 공중 강습
foreignNames.text: 탭된 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다. 당신은 당신이 조종하는 비행을 가진 생물 한 개당 생명 1점을 얻는다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"아, 네가 잘못 알고 있던 게 틀림없어. 너도 봐서 알겠지만, 매들은 혼자서 사냥한다고."
—조류학자, 번더 디드렉

foreignNames.name: Ataque Aéreo
foreignNames.text: Destrua a criatura virada alvo. Você ganha 1 ponto de vida para cada criatura com voar que você controla.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Ah, você deve ter se enganado. Os falcões são caçadores solitários, sabe?"
— Bunder Diedreck, ornitólogo

foreignNames.name: Нападение с Воздуха
foreignNames.text: Уничтожьте целевое повернутое существо. Вы получаете 1 жизнь за каждое существо с Полетом под вашим контролем.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Нет, ты, должно быть, ошибаешься. Видишь ли, ястребы охотятся в одиночку».
— Бандер Дидрек, орнитолог

foreignNames.name: 空中突袭
foreignNames.text: 消灭目标已横置的生物。你每操控一个具飞行异能的生物，便获得1点生命。
foreignNames.flavor:
「噢，你肯定哪里搞错了。老鹰虽凶猛，但不会一起行动。」
～鸟类学家本德迪垂克

foreignNames.name: 空中突襲
foreignNames.text: 消滅目標已橫置的生物。你每操控一個具飛行異能的生物，便獲得1點生命。
foreignNames.flavor:
「噢，你肯定哪裡搞錯了。老鷹雖兇猛，但不會一起行動。」
～鳥類學家本德迪垂克

cards.originalText: Destroy target tapped creature. You gain 1 life for each creature you control with flying.
